doc:
Markie Post https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markie_Post 0 Marjorie Armstrong "Markie" Post (born November 4, 1950) is an American actress, known for her roles as bail bondswoman Terri Michaels in The Fall Guy on ABC from 1982 to 1985, as public defender Christine Sullivan on the NBC sitcom Night Court from 1985 to 1992, and as Georgie Anne Lahti Hartman on the CBS sitcom Hearts Afire from 1992 to 1995. Marjorie_Armstrong_"_Markie_"_Post ( born November_4_,_1950 ) is an_American_actress , known for her_roles as bail_bondswoman_Terri_Michaels in The_Fall Guy on ABC from 1982 to 1985 , as public_defender_Christine_Sullivan on the_NBC_sitcom_Night_Court from 1985 to 1992 , and as Georgie_Anne_Lahti_Hartman on the_CBS_sitcom_Hearts_Afire from 1992 to 1995 .
